seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed for reproducible results. Leave blank for random generation.

text.title: Text
text.description:
Text to synthesize into speech (maximum 500 characters).

Supported paralinguistic tags you can include in your text:
[clear throat], [sigh], [sush], [cough], [groan], [sniff], [gasp], [chuckle], [laugh]

Example: "Oh, that's hilarious! [chuckle] Let me tell you more."

top_k.title: Top K
top_k.description: Top-k sampling. Limits vocabulary to top k tokens at each step.

top_p.title: Top P
top_p.description: Nucleus sampling threshold. Lower values make output more focused.

voice.title: voice
voice.description: Pre-made voice to use for synthesis. Ignored if reference_audio is provided.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: Controls randomness in generation. Higher values produce more varied speech.

reference_audio.title: Reference Audio
reference_audio.description: Reference audio file for voice cloning (optional). Must be longer than 5 seconds. If provided, overrides the voice selection.

repetition_penalty.title: Repetition Penalty
repetition_penalty.description: Penalizes token repetition. Higher values reduce repetition.
